game.name: life is not auto
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "LIFE IS NOT AUTO"는 리듬 + 생존 기반의 타이밍 게임 입니다. 여러분은 수동으로 장기를 컨트롤해 캐릭터의 생명을 유지하여 일생에 이르도록 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "LIFE IS NOT AUTO"is a rhythm + survival based timing game. You manually control the organs to keep your character alive until life ends.

reviewHighlights.text: cute and funny idea, but its just extremely difficult in a way that isnt fun and its hard to know how and why you failed so you can improve on it in t...
The gameplay is a big mess, the translation is incomplete and inconsistent.
